name: [MILLION LIVE!/ミリオンライブ/ミリシタ] Kotoha Tanaka/田中琴葉 LoRA
description:
LoRA model of Kotoha Tanaka (田中琴葉) from media-mix project THE IDOLM@STER MILLION LIVE! (アイドルマスターミリオンライブ！).

Base model for training is animefull-latest, and the trigger word is kotoha tanaka (million live).

During test, I think the overall result is good with LoRA weights 0.65-0.75. However, you can try other weights.

Note: I am not using the official LoRA loader, so you should use the additional network WebUI plugin to use my LoRA setting.

I'll appreciate it if you're willing to use this LoRA model and share AI arts to other people. I’m looking forward to your wonderful work.

————————————

跨媒体企划《偶像大师 百万现场》的角色田中琴叶的LoRA模型

训练时使用的基底模型为animefull-latest；模型的触发词为 kotoha tanaka (million live)

测试的时候发现LoRA权重为0.65-0.75时有不错的效果。不过您也可以尝试其他权重值

示例图是通过WebUI的可选附加网络（additional network）插件加载本LoRA模型生成的，所以prompt里并没有调用LoRA的tag，还请注意

如果您愿意使用本LoRA模型并将作品分享给其他人，本人将不胜感激。期待您的佳作。
